verses.text_plain: Be not thou envious against evil men, neither desire to be with them.
verses.verse_html: 1Be not thou envious against evil men, neither desire to be with them.

verses.text_plain: For their heart studieth destruction, and their lips talk of mischief.
verses.verse_html: 2For their heart studieth destruction, and their lips talk of mischief.

verses.text_plain: Through wisdom is an house builded; and by understanding it is established:
verses.verse_html: 3Through wisdom is an house builded; and by understanding it is established:

verses.text_plain: And by knowledge shall the chambers be filled with all precious and pleasant riches.
verses.verse_html: 4And by knowledge shall the chambers be filled with all precious and pleasant riches.

verses.text_plain: A wise man is strong; yea, a man of knowledge increaseth strength.
verses.verse_html:
5A wise man is strong; yea, a man of knowledge increaseth strength. ▼
▼ is strong: Heb. is in strength
 , ▼
▼ increaseth…: Heb. strengtheneth might

footnotes.body_text: ▼ is strong: Heb. is in strength
footnotes.body_html: ▼ is strong: Heb. is in strength
▼ increaseth…: Heb. strengtheneth might

verses.text_plain: For by wise counsel thou shalt make thy war: and in multitude of counsellors there is safety.
verses.verse_html: 6For by wise counsel thou shalt make thy war: and in multitude of counsellors there is safety.

verses.text_plain: Wisdom is too high for a fool: he openeth not his mouth in the gate.
verses.verse_html: 7Wisdom is too high for a fool: he openeth not his mouth in the gate.

verses.text_plain: He that deviseth to do evil shall be called a mischievous person.
verses.verse_html: 8He that deviseth to do evil shall be called a mischievous person.

verses.text_plain: The thought of foolishness is sin: and the scorner is an abomination to men.
verses.verse_html: 9The thought of foolishness is sin: and the scorner is an abomination to men.

verses.text_plain: If thou faint in the day of adversity, thy strength is small.
verses.verse_html:
10If thou faint in the day of adversity, thy strength is small. ▼
▼ small: Heb. narrow

verses.text_plain: If thou forbear to deliver them that are drawn unto death, and those that are ready to be slain;
verses.verse_html: 11If thou forbear to deliver them that are drawn unto death, and those that are ready to be slain;

verses.text_plain: If thou sayest, Behold, we knew it not; doth not he that pondereth the heart consider it? and he that keepeth thy soul, doth not he know it? and shall not he render to every man according to his works?
verses.verse_html: 12If thou sayest, Behold, we knew it not; doth not he that pondereth the heart consider it? and he that keepeth thy soul, doth not he know it? and shall not he render to every man according to his works?

tokens.text: it not; doth not he that pondereth

verses.text_plain: My son, eat thou honey, because it is good; and the honeycomb, which is sweet to thy taste:
verses.verse_html:
13My son, eat thou honey, because it is good; and the honeycomb, which is sweet to thy taste: ▼
▼ to…: Heb. upon thy palate

footnotes.body_html: ▼ to…: Heb. upon thy palate

verses.text_plain: So shall the knowledge of wisdom be unto thy soul: when thou hast found it, then there shall be a reward, and thy expectation shall not be cut off.
verses.verse_html: 14So shall the knowledge of wisdom be unto thy soul: when thou hast found it, then there shall be a reward, and thy expectation shall not be cut off.

verses.text_plain: Lay not wait, O wicked man, against the dwelling of the righteous; spoil not his resting place:
verses.verse_html: 15Lay not wait, O wicked man, against the dwelling of the righteous; spoil not his resting place:

verses.text_plain: For a just man falleth seven times, and riseth up again: but the wicked shall fall into mischief.
verses.verse_html: 16For a just man falleth seven times, and riseth up again: but the wicked shall fall into mischief.

verses.text_plain: Rejoice not when thine enemy falleth, and let not thine heart be glad when he stumbleth:
verses.verse_html: 17Rejoice not when thine enemy falleth, and let not thine heart be glad when he stumbleth:

verses.text_plain: Lest the Lord see it, and it displease him, and he turn away his wrath from him.
verses.verse_html:
18Lest the Lord see it, and it displease him, and he turn away his wrath from him. ▼
▼ it displease…: Heb. it be evil in his eyes

footnotes.body_text: ▼ it displease…: Heb. it be evil in his eyes
footnotes.body_html: ▼ it displease…: Heb. it be evil in his eyes

verses.text_plain: Fret not thyself because of evil men, neither be thou envious at the wicked;
verses.verse_html:
19Fret not thyself because of evil men, neither be thou envious at the wicked; ▼
▼ Fret…: or, Keep not company with the wicked

footnotes.body_text: ▼ Fret…: or, Keep not company with the wicked
footnotes.body_html: ▼ Fret…: or, Keep not company with the wicked

verses.text_plain: For there shall be no reward to the evil man; the candle of the wicked shall be put out.
verses.verse_html:
20For there shall be no reward to the evil man; the candle of the wicked shall be put out. ▼
▼ candle: or, lamp

tokens.text: For there shall be no reward

verses.text_plain: My son, fear thou the Lord and the king: and meddle not with them that are given to change:
verses.verse_html:
21My son, fear thou the Lord and the king: and meddle not with them that are given to change: ▼
▼ them…: Heb. changers

tokens.text: not with them that are given to change

verses.text_plain: For their calamity shall rise suddenly; and who knoweth the ruin of them both?
verses.verse_html: 22For their calamity shall rise suddenly; and who knoweth the ruin of them both?

verses.text_plain: These things also belong to the wise. It is not good to have respect of persons in judgment.
verses.verse_html: 23These things also belong to the wise. It is not good to have respect of persons in judgment.

verses.text_plain: He that saith unto the wicked, Thou art righteous; him shall the people curse, nations shall abhor him:
verses.verse_html: 24He that saith unto the wicked, Thou art righteous; him shall the people curse, nations shall abhor him:

verses.text_plain: But to them that rebuke him shall be delight, and a good blessing shall come upon them.
verses.verse_html:
25But to them that rebuke him shall be delight, and a good blessing shall come upon them. ▼
▼ a good…: Heb. a blessing of good

footnotes.body_text: ▼ a good…: Heb. a blessing of good
footnotes.body_html: ▼ a good…: Heb. a blessing of good

verses.text_plain: Every man shall kiss his lips that giveth a right answer.
verses.verse_html:
26Every man shall kiss his lips that giveth a right answer. ▼
▼ that…: Heb. that answereth right words

footnotes.body_text: ▼ that…: Heb. that answereth right words
footnotes.body_html: ▼ that…: Heb. that answereth right words

verses.text_plain: Prepare thy work without, and make it fit for thyself in the field; and afterwards build thine house.
verses.verse_html: 27Prepare thy work without, and make it fit for thyself in the field; and afterwards build thine house.

verses.text_plain: Be not a witness against thy neighbour without cause; and deceive not with thy lips.
verses.verse_html: 28Be not a witness against thy neighbour without cause; and deceive not with thy lips.

verses.text_plain: Say not, I will do so to him as he hath done to me: I will render to the man according to his work.
verses.verse_html: 29Say not, I will do so to him as he hath done to me: I will render to the man according to his work.

tokens.text: so to him as he hath done

verses.text_plain: I went by the field of the slothful, and by the vineyard of the man void of understanding;
verses.verse_html: 30I went by the field of the slothful, and by the vineyard of the man void of understanding;

verses.text_plain: And, lo, it was all grown over with thorns, and nettles had covered the face thereof, and the stone wall thereof was broken down.
verses.verse_html: 31And, lo, it was all grown over with thorns, and nettles had covered the face thereof, and the stone wall thereof was broken down.

tokens.text: And, lo, it was all grown over

verses.text_plain: Then I saw, and considered it well: I looked upon it, and received instruction.
verses.verse_html:
32Then I saw, and considered it well: I looked upon it, and received instruction. ▼
▼ considered…: Heb. set my heart

footnotes.body_html: ▼ considered…: Heb. set my heart

verses.text_plain: Yet a little sleep, a little slumber, a little folding of the hands to sleep:
verses.verse_html: 33Yet a little sleep, a little slumber, a little folding of the hands to sleep:

verses.text_plain: So shall thy poverty come as one that travelleth; and thy want as an armed man.
verses.verse_html:
34So shall thy poverty come as one that travelleth; and thy want as an armed man. ▼
▼ an…: Heb. a man of shield

footnotes.body_text: ▼ an…: Heb. a man of shield
footnotes.body_html: ▼ an…: Heb. a man of shield
